Interface AreaSliceState

interface AreaSliceState {
    _id: number;
    activeAreaId: null | string;
    addArea: ((area) => string);
    areaToOpen: null | {
        area: {
            state: any;
            type: string;
        };
        position: Point;
    };
    areas: {
        [key: string]: IArea<AreaTypeValue>;
    };
    cleanupTemporaryStates: (() => void);
    errors: string[];
    finalizeAreaPlacement: ((payload?) => void);
    getActiveArea: (() => null | IArea<string>);
    getAllAreas: (() => Record<string, IArea<string>>);
    getAreaById: ((id) => undefined | IArea<string>);
    getAreaErrors: (() => string[]);
    getLastLeadAreaId: (() => null | string);
    getLastSplitResult: (() => null | SplitResult);
    isDetached?: boolean;
    isLocked?: boolean;
    joinOrMoveArea: ((payload) => void);
    joinPreview: null | JoinPreviewState;
    lastLeadAreaId?: null | string;
    lastSplitResultData: null | SplitResult;
    layout: {
        [key: string]: AreaRowLayout | AreaLayout;
    };
    removeArea: ((id) => void);
    rootId: null | string;
    setActiveArea: ((id) => void);
    setAreaToOpen: ((payload) => void);
    setJoinPreview: ((payload) => void);
    setRowSizes: ((payload) => void);
    setViewports: ((viewports) => void);
    splitArea: ((payload) => null | SplitResult);
    updateArea: ((areaData) => void);
    updateAreaToOpenPosition: ((position) => void);
    updateLayout: ((layoutData) => void);
    viewports: {
        [key: string]: Rect;
    };
}
